ComicInfo.Title: The Dating Pool!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Things are never easy for the Bravest Warriors, it’s probably what makes them so gosh darn likable. This issue isn’t just another “will they, won’t they” between Beth and Chris (answer: socks), it’s another mission where the Bravest Warriors will get to bring their unique personalities together to overcome all obstacles in their way!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tyson Hesse | 1 | B | Cover B | Michelle Nunnelly | 2 | C | Cover C | Ashley Davis | 3 | D | Cover D | Matt Sheean | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 07:52:10. [CVDB433973]

ComicInfo.Characters: Beth Tezuka, Catbug, Chris Kirkman, Danny Vasquez, DJ Shap Fancy Bone, Paralyzed Horse, Plum, Space Chicken, Wallow
